posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I would like to buy, or maybe trade for a T213-3 Miller Huggins port card.  Low grade is just fine as it will blend in nicely with my low end Type 1 and Type 2 Huggins ports, but will take a look at any that anyone would like to get rid of and help my finish off my 3 types of the T213 run of Huggins cards.  If you have any of the other pose, I will be more than happy to take a look at those as well.
Happy Holidays,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
